data2.title: What is Netflix?
data2.desc:
Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows movies anime documentaries and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.{
} You can watch as much as you wan whenever you want without a single ad all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover and new TV shows and movies are added every week!
